ns0:StringWithMarkup.ns0:String: LC50 Lepomis macrochirus (Bluegill sunfish, standard length 3.8 cm) 1.5 mg/L/24 hr; 1.2 mg/L/48 hr, 96 hr; static, temperature 22 °C, dissolved oxygen 0.4-8.3 mg/L, pH 6.8-7.3, water hardness (CaCO3) 255 ppm.

LC50 Oncorhynchus mykiss (Rainbow trout, standard length 2.7 cm) 0.47 mg/L/24 hr; 0.42 mg/L/48 hr; 0.41 mg/L/96 hr; static, temperature 12 °C, dissolved oxygen 5.2-9.8 mg/L, pH 7.2-7.6, water hardness (CaCO3) 255 ppm.

LC50 Pimephales promelas (Fathead minnow, standard weight 0.56 g, standard length 29.3 mm) 0.43 mg/L/24 hr; 0.42 mg/L/192 hr; 0.40 mg/L/240 hr; 0.39 mg/L/336 hr; flow-through, temperature 22 °C, dissolved oxygen 9.3 mg/L, pH 7.7, water hardness (CaCO3) 250 mg/L, alkalinity 360 mg/L

LC50 Paratanytarsus parthenogenetica (Midge, 3rd and 4th instar larvae, 8-10 days old) 130 mg/L/48 hr; static, temperature 20 °C, dissolved oxygen 8.9 to 7.9 mg/L, pH 7.9 to 8.3, water hardness (CaCO3) 255 ppm.
EC50 Selenastrum capricornutum (Freshwater alga; inhibition of growth rate) 21 ppm/96 hr; static, temperature 24 °C, pH 7.8 to 7.0
EC50 Daphnia magna (immobilization) 32 mg/L/48 hr, 24 hr (95% confidence interval: 22-46 mg/L) /Conditions of bioassay not specified in source examined/
